thread.title: Indy Star columnist Gregg Doyel shares his thoughts | Black and Gold Today
thread.title_full: Indy Star columnist Gregg Doyel shares his thoughts | Black and Gold Today | NOLA.com

author: Jim Derry, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Indy Star columnist Gregg Doyel shares his thoughts | Black and Gold Today
text:
It appears as if the New Orleans Saints and Sunday's opponent, the Indianapolis Colts, have a lot in common. Both have been very disappointing, but both appear to be playing better than early in the season.
On Tuesday's edition of the Black and Gold Today sponsored by Cadillac of New Orleans (video above), NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune's Jim Derry brings in Indianapolis Star columnist Gregg Doyel to discuss what's wrong with the Colts and their similarities with the Saints. He also gives a prediction on the game.
For the Extra Point, Jim looks at the cartoon version of the master fail in Indy last Sunday night with their fake punt attempt. And it's just as comical as a video game.
Also, don't forget to vote today's poll (below), which is open until Wednesday morning at 10 a.m.
<
